revised_title: Operator Equivalents and Crystal Field Parameters for Excited States of Rare-Earth Ions
tldr: This article extends the theory of operator equivalents to crystal fields of symmetry and develops methods for treating the excited levels of rare-earth ions. The author presents operator equivalences for potential forms and their matrix elements, tabulating them over a range of total angular momentum that includes the states of all rare-earth ions. The study aims to relate the crystal splitting observed spectroscopically to the crystal-field parameters in rare-earth double nitrates.
